column1: Bavette's Bar & Boeuf////The earliest reservation I could get was 9 p.m. on a Friday (so be on the lookout and book early!) because peak dinner times go fast. We arrived right on time
column2: but the restaurant was pretty backed up from the One of a Kind Show across the street. We probably waited 15 or so minutes until our table was ready
column3: but no big deal because the bar is AMAZIN'. Cool cocktails
column4: bartenders and overall vibe at this place. I got the Bavette's Punch (because
column5: obviously) and my boyfriend got the Mint Julep. Both were so good!
